definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: cummin, plant grown as condiment (LXX ku/minon, cuminum cyminum; Plin.:NH xix. 8; Germ. ‘römischer Kümmel;’ Löw:No. 152; √ dub.; NH id.; Aram. [[כַּמּוֹנׇא]], kamuwno0; Ar. kam=uwnun, Eth. kamin: on format. cf. Lag:BN 89; loan-word acc. to Di:832);—Is 28:25, Is 28:27, Is 28:27.
